how-to-implement: in your meta.json - define *extended* with url to this (json) file - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cardanians/adapools.org/master/example-meta.json

info.url_png_icon_64x64: http(s) url to pool icon; png format; not animated; max 40kb
info.url_png_logo: http(s) url to pool logo; png format; not animated; max 50kb

about.me: Married. Father of 5. Part-time Organic Farmer. TREK is your path to Cardano Staking.  The Journey Awaits. Let's TREK Together.
